Name: M2K
About the game: You landed on labyrinth-planet, where all territory filled of puzzles. Your need clearance mines and destroy trolls. When entering new rooms puzzles have more objects. You awaiting not only moving boxes, destructable walls, static lasers, electricity, speading acid, and more & more. If you do error sometimes level must be restarted. Game have internal level editor and docs. Remake original M2K game from 1998 (Zx-spectrum) with crossplatform,better graphics and PS3 controller support.
